summary: This is a redone interior for the Haven Bag mod, released with permission, that resembles an outdoor campsite.
descriptionHtml:
This is a redone interior for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21454/?]Haven Bag[/url] mod by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1730967]Caithe[/url], released with permission, that resembles more an outdoor campsite. Clutter has been reduced, one new amenity added, and the entire feel changed.

--Uses Slot 60
--5 chests, 3 barrels, 3 satchels, 3 sacks, 3 urns, 1 knapsack for storage
--Adds wood chopping block and a chair for relaxing
--Low-lit for ambience
--All smithing amenities, bedroll, cooking pot, alchemy and enchanting stations
--Requires no DLC

The function of the Haven Bag is unchanged from the original, latest version linked above. I did nothing but change the interior.

I did my best with the uneven ground to make sure nothing looks like it's floating.

Please go check out the original Haven Bag mod!!

UPDATE 1/22/15:

--Added a shrine of Arkay because I was getting SO sick of always having rockjoint and bone break fever from fighting so many wolves/bears
--Replaced the background music with a different track
--Second version using Slot 49 (accidentally replaced Slot 60 version when uploading last night; Slot 60 version is now back)
author: MadModderJess
